entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -31.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -31.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -35.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
